Summary Note:
Lucía Encarna Pérez and the RM met at a networking event in Madrid. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Lucía Encarna Pérez is a 57 year old CEO from Spain.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Lucía Encarna Pérez has been happily married to Gil since 1993. Their child is  named Cayetana.
Education Background:
In 1985, Lucía finished her secondary school education at Colegio El Pilar Getafe.
Lucía graduated from University of Barcelona in 1990, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 34 years, Lucía Encarna Pérez has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Lucía Encarna Pérez began her professional journey as a Drilling Engineer at Enagás S.A. in 1991, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Reservoir Engineer at Enagás S.A. in 1997, further expanding her skill set.
Her tenure as a Operations Manager at Enagás S.A. from 2004 to 2007 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
In 2009, she transitioned to Repsol S.A. to take on the position of VP of Exploration, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
She has been a CEO at Gas Natural Fenosa S.A. since 2015, consistently demonstrating her ability to adapt, innovate, and thrive in an ever-changing environment.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 500000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns villa in Logroño, where she resides. It is worth 2520000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 7050000 EUR from her mother, a respected Neurosurgeon, in 2006, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Lucía as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
